attributes.action: lower the age of smears allowing girls from 16 to be checked
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are asking that the minimum age of smears to be lowered from 25 to 16. If you are legally allowing 16 year olds to have sex then treat them the same as a woman in her late 20's. There is no less of a risk in under 25's of a woman getting cervical cancer, cancer knows no age!
